title: Part a.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for stating that the central bank should buy bonds.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for stating that the central bank should buy bonds.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for stating that the central bank should buy bonds.

title: Part b
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for calculating the maximum change in the money supply, which is $50 million, and for showing correct work.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for calculating the maximum change in the money supply, which is $50 million, and for showing correct work.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for calculating the maximum change in the money supply, which is $50 million, and for showing correct work.

title: Part c.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

One point is earned for stating that the nominal interest rate will fall.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for stating that the nominal interest rate will fall.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for stating that the nominal interest rate will fall.

title: Part d.
stimulusHtml:
2 points

One point is earned for stating that the real interest rate will fall.

One point is earned for explaining that the real rate falls because the nominal rate has decreased and inflation has increased.
descriptions:
No point earned.

One point is earned for stating that the real interest rate will fall.

One point is earned for explaining that the real rate falls because the nominal rate has decreased and inflation has increased.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

One point is earned for stating that the real interest rate will fall.

One point is earned for explaining that the real rate falls because the nominal rate has decreased and inflation has increased.

Earns 2 of 2 points

One point is earned for stating that the real interest rate will fall.

One point is earned for explaining that the real rate falls because the nominal rate has decreased and inflation has increased.
